subject: Your job application at Litera
text:
Dear Ishan Phadte,

Thank you for your interest and the time you've invested in applying for the Full Stack Developer position at Litera. We truly appreciate your effort.

After a thorough review, we've made the decision to proceed with another candidate. However, please don't let this deter your enthusiasm for exploring other opportunities at Litera. We warmly invite you to explore our career site and apply for any other roles that pique your interest.

Kind Regards,
Litera Recruiting Team

subject: Lincoln Financial Job Application Update
text: Hi Ishan, Thank you for pursuing a career at Lincoln Financial, we recognize the courage it takes to apply for a new position and greatly appreciate that you chose us in your search. Our team carefully reviewed your qualifications for the Associate Software Engineer (Requisition #74547) position and have moved forward with other candidates who more closely align with this roleâ€™s requirements.  We welcome and encourage you to keep pursuing opportunities and learning about all that Lincoln has to offer by visiting our careers page or Life tab on LinkedIn. As Abraham Lincoln once said, I say try; if we never try
label: we shall never succeed." We wish you much success as you continue your search! Lincoln Financial Recruiting Team"

subject: Application Outcome - FinServe
text:
Hi Ishan,

Thank you for applying for the Data Analyst role at FinServe. After careful review, we have decided to move forward with another candidate.

We encourage you to apply for future opportunities.

Sincerely,
FinServe Recruitment

subject: Phone Screening - BrightTech
text:
Hi Ishan,

We are excited to schedule a 30-minute phone screening for the Junior Frontend Developer position at BrightTech. Please let us know your availability.

Best regards,
BrightTech Recruiting Team

subject: Technical Interview - NextGen Solutions
text:
Dear Ishan,

Congratulations! We would like to invite you for a technical interview for the Backend Developer role at NextGen Solutions. The interview will be held remotely. Kindly confirm your preferred time slot.

Regards,
NextGen Solutions HR

subject: Application Update - AlphaTech
text:

subject: Application Outcome - QuantumSoft
text:

subject: Status Update - ApexSystems
text:
Hi Ishan,

We appreciate your interest in the Systems Analyst role at ApexSystems. After a thorough review, we have chosen to proceed with other candidates.
